name: Sector583
description:
Sector583 is a solo project created in unreal engine, the purpose is to show off level design. The gameplay and mechanics are prototyped and enemy damage has not been implemented for purposes of testing the level layout. All assets (other than UE4 mannequins & particle effects) were created by me along with most of the blueprints. The enemy spawner was taken from an online tutorial.

Enemy Spawner: www.youtube.com/watch?v=UmohrS-hh6c
